alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:48PM MDT until August 03 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 547 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Rush to 5 miles southeast of Truckton to 12 miles east of Hanover, or along a line extending from 32 miles east of Colorado Springs to 85 miles southeast of Denver to 28 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 526 PM, a 64 mph gust was recorded at Ellicott in El Paso county. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Forder. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
